items.sentence: I thought that Tom would ask Mary to do that.
I think that Tom doesn't know how to do that.
I think that Tom has done that once or twice.
I think that Tom is doing that the wrong way.
I think that Tom is going to do that as well.
I think that Tom is interested in doing that.
I think that Tom would be tempted to do that.
I think that Tom was the last one to do that.
I think that Tom thought I wanted to do that.
I think that Tom might want to do that today.
